title: 148.691 OFFICERS; EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.
text:
The board shall elect from its members a president, a vice-president, and a secretary-treasurer. Each shall serve for one year or until a successor is elected and qualifies. The board shall appoint and employ an executive secretary. A majority of the board, including one officer, constitutes a quorum at a meeting.
The board may employ persons needed to carry out its work.
[Repealed, 2007 c 123 s 137]
